title: Kawai Full Throttle!
description:
Description :
        Kawai, an emotional, quirky, and somewhat twisted elementary school girl, accidentally lets her classmate Takenouchi witness one of her most embarrassing moments. But somehow, this awkward incident leads to an unexpected friendship between the two. Watch as these two, far from your typical elementary school kids, engage in lively, heartfelt conversations in this heartwarming comedy!
